title: "Prestige" is just the name of the skin line. It doesn't make those skins prestigious.
body:
You can buy "syrup" made by "Maple Grove Farms" with "butter flavor" that contains neither maple nor butter. "Prestige Akali," "Prestige Aatrox," etc. don't add to your prestige, they don't make you appear prestigious, they don't have any inherent property of prestige. It's just the name.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haddocks%27_Eyes

And there's gonna be a million of 'em.

https://www.penny-arcade.com/comic/2005/04/25/an-artifact-of-great-power

replies.body:
There's going to be a lot of prestige skins, but these specific ones are never returning. The prestige comes from the fact that they are exclusive to these events at this time. The only people who will ever have them are the people who get them in the short window they're available. 

Prestige skins as a concept aren't rare, but each individual skin is. The people who currently have Prestige K/DA Kai'Sa and Akali are the only people who ever will. That is a perfect example of something being prestigious.

> [{quoted}](name=iiGazeii,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AKEXAggg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-11T05:05:43.062+0000)
>
> There's going to be a lot of prestige skins, but these specific ones are never returning. The prestige comes from the fact that they are exclusive to these events at this time. The only people who will ever have them are the people who get them in the short window they're available. 
> 
> Prestige skins as a concept aren't rare, but each individual skin is. The people who currently have Prestige K/DA Kai'Sa and Akali are the only people who ever will. That is a perfect example of something being prestigious.

Just like Legacy skins, right? Those things that never show up in the Vault, or as Honor rewards, or as random shards, etc.? Yep. Very prestigious.

They have never actually said these are never returning.  They used to do that with Limited skins and most of those were placed into legacy later on, as Riot felt some of them just werent seen as much anymore due to the game growing over the years.

> [{quoted}](name=iiGazeii,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AKEXAggg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-11T05:05:43.062+0000)
>
> There's going to be a lot of prestige skins, but these specific ones are never returning. The prestige comes from the fact that they are exclusive to these events at this time. The only people who will ever have them are the people who get them in the short window they're available. 
> 
> Prestige skins as a concept aren't rare, but each individual skin is. The people who currently have Prestige K/DA Kai'Sa and Akali are the only people who ever will. That is a perfect example of something being prestigious.

You can get them through regular hextech chests - just like any other skin. So, ye there is nothing prestigious about them.
